website_summaries.verdict: Good value for mat strap that doubles as yoga stretching strap.
pros: Simple, quick and easy to use strap that holds mat without Velcro
cons: The long is very long and regular is a little too short for some people

customer_reviews.title: Great strap!
customer_reviews.text: SO happy with this! I'll be honest- I was just looking for something cheap. I don't carry my mat anywhere- I just wanted something to keep it rolled up and out of the way at home. I saw someone with a strap around their mat, like a candy cane, so it would stay snug. When this arrived, it was much higher quality than I expected. My mat is one of the lite pros from a popular brand, and despite being "lite," it's pretty hefty- and this strap really holds up!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Get It
customer_reviews.text: While simple as a product may come, 2 stars suits it well. It functions yes, but for me, the material or rather choice of fabric is very stiff and seems a little long. I get it, the maker wants a high quality product and it is, but use material that has more dexterity in it or one that is not as stiff as cardboard. Other than that, great execution with the quality of secured stitching
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo S

customer_reviews.title: simple solution works well
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times thusfar, but the strap works well. A nice feature that you can't necessarily see in the pics is that where the loop is meant to slide up/down to loosen/tighten your loop, the strap is folded in half and sewn so it slides better but still has plenty of friction to hold once you tighten. As an aside, I got the longer length for a single, somewhat thick, mat (figured too much was better than not enough), and I have a lot of extra length, even when carrying it crossbody. For reference, about 5'8" tall and slender build.
customer_reviews.author: alleghenysam

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy yoga strap-- very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this strap today for the first time and I love it! My mat is super heavy (8 lbs.) and this strap makes it much more comfortable to carry. I also love that it is made from cotton and not nylon, and it's wider so it puts less strain on my shoulder. I haven't used it in my yoga practice yet, as it is suggested, but I'm sure it'll be perfect for it. The pink is a pretty medium pink with contrasting purple stitching-- just girly enough! The company's customer service is great and I have confidence that if I have any issue in the future, they will do their best to make sure I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup; just slip on and pull to tighten. Will not come loose due to gravity or shaking from side-to-side (less you don't tighten it enough to begin with). Only able to release when using both hands to loosen. Prefect length for one shoulder carry or cross body. Does not feel like the yoga mat sags at anytime. Purchased a 66inch. I'm 5'9''. Mat is of average size. Doubles as a yoga strap for various stretching exercises Nothing else to say. It works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: works great, absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I got a bag with my new yoga mat and it was annoying having to get a sweat covered mat inside of it after class. So I bought this strap and after using it a few times to carry my mat I will NEVER go back to my old bag. I have also used it as a strap in class and it worked great. So I will never be without a strap in class again. and one of my favorite parts is that it does not take up a lot of room next to my mat during practice like the bag that I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Hopefully Helpful

customer_reviews.title: Nice strap
customer_reviews.text: This strap is great. My spouse was also impressed, so we might have to pick up another one eventually. I like that the cotton material is soft/warm, unlike nylon which can feel more cold and slippery. The natural friction allows it to secure a mat without the need for annoying mechanical fasteners like D-rings or Velcro. It's easy to loosen when it's time to use the mat and the loops pretty much hold their position so it goes back on the mat without a lot of fuss. A light pull on each end and it's ready to carry again. I'm 5'10" and the standard size is the perfect length with my mat (71" x 24"; 4.7 mm thick).
customer_reviews.author: B Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Not using for intended purpose ;). Am carrying a onewheel!
customer_reviews.text: I don't use it for it's intended purpose, so I can't speak to that, use other reviews for that. However if you're coming to this product because you heard it's great for carrying Onewheels, then definitely A+ for that. It's strong, folds down small (done right it'll squeeze into a cargo pocket). Get the seatbelt cover you've hopefully heard about to make it a tad softer on the shoulder and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Clever idea with many uses
customer_reviews.text: Being a bit older and larger than the trim folks you usually see in yoga, i use an exercise mat about 3'x6.5' for practice instead of the typical rolled type. My equipment maIt folds up my mat and then bend the folded together, length wise, and it fits perfectly in the Clever Yoga "mat sling" however, because "mat sling" is essentially an 8' strap with adjustable loops on either end it works perfectly for those yoga moves requiring a strap. Double duty, well made and a really clever idea you can't beat that.
customer_reviews.author: JohnA. C.

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: This strap perfectly holds my oversized yoga mat. I wish I would have bought this years ago. I had been stuffing my mat into a yoga mat bag that was just too small. Getting the mat back out of the bag each time was torture. This strap is exactly all that I need. It holds the mat in its rolled shape whether it's being carried or after it's been tossed in the back of the car. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: beverly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for carrying skates!
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, I know this is supposed to be a yoga mat strap, but I ordered it hoping that it would allow me to carry my inline skates more easily, and it's perfect! The loops at the end wrap snugly around my skates, AND I'm also able to slide my knee pads and wrist guards over the strap to carry those, too. Seller, if you're reading this: Cross-market this product as a skate strap!
customer_reviews.author: SLG521

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the strap for one weekend so far, to bring my yoga mat from home to car to an Airbnb and back (weekend getaway). I haven't had to carry my mat for more than 5 minutes at a time, so I can't comment on comfort and durability for longer walks, but for the few mins I used it each time, this yoga strap does its job. Glad to be able to support a women-owned small business!
customer_reviews.author: MelD

customer_reviews.title: Doubles as a Yoga Strap
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have been more happy with this purchase. I wanted something clean and simple and airy. I don't like throwing my mat in a bag. This was exactly and better than I could have hoped. I'd highly recommend this. I'm 6'1". I bought the X-L version and it hangs just below my butt. Plus, I didn't realize it was made from almost the exact same material (though a bit more sturdy) as many yoga straps. Consequently, I frequently reach for it when I don't have a yoga strap handy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Good strap, easy to use, holds the mat well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this strap to carry an extra long rubber mat and it's perfect. I have the shorter or regular size and it works fine. I can use this as a strap in practice as it's long enough, just, and it's one less thing to carry around. I had considered getting the longer strap because I am tall, but like the way this one holds. the mat on my hip.
customer_reviews.author: G. Powell

customer_reviews.title: don't bother
customer_reviews.text: The only adjustable piece of this is the loops to fit around the mat. You are stuck with the length of the full strap which is way too long for anybody considering i'm 6'3" and look like an idiot walking around with this thing. You're literally buying a 50 cent nylon strap with two adjustable holes. Even at $5 this is way overpriced. Either buy a better strap for a similar price or tie a rope around the mat for free. This is the worst of both worlds.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the yogi on the go
customer_reviews.text: I tend to commute by metro or walk to my local studio, so this strap has been a godsend. It's easy to attach to my mat and holds it in place. The strap is comfortable too; I've both slung it over my shoulder or used it like a cross-body bag to keep my mat at my back. Either way it's been great. It also works well as a prop in class.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gump

customer_reviews.title: Soft yet sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good length and overall size/weight as expected. Soft enough that it doesn’t cause “rope burn” on my shoulders like some other straps do. I find it a little challenging to get the strap loops to open up and close back around me mat but perhaps they will soften with more use as I break it in? Overall it’s a super easy way to carry my mat to practice and back.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa G.

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY the Search is Over!
customer_reviews.text: Quit the strap hunt and buy this. I am so glad i got this, it's the perfect strap! Not flimsy, stays put, a good solid strap that fits my yoga mat or my thicker pilates mat. Actually, if i roll both mats together the shorter strap fits and allows a small "handle". I just ordered the longer one to I can sling it over my shoulder.. And it was a great price! and the customer service was really good, i got an email from the company asking if I received it and what I thought about it, so that's a plus - communication with an actual person that responds! I wouldn't get anything else, Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: L. Webster

customer_reviews.title: This yoga strap is fantastic! It is really well-made and the color is ...
customer_reviews.text: This yoga strap is fantastic! It is really well-made and the color is very pretty. It adjusts to my Manduko 85" yoga mat with plenty of room to through it over my shoulder and carry it. The Seller also contacted me to make sure I was happy with the strap and I like when a company contacts me to insure that I am happy with an item I purchased from them and wants to make sure that I am. Give it a try ... you will NOT be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: MATEICH

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This simple cotton strap is perfect for carrying my 5 mm thick yoga mat to class - and could adjust to carry much thicker mats. Cinched tight, it stays closed while the mat isn't in use. It's simple to put the mat into after class, and after months of constant use is in great shape. It even doubles as a short yoga strap.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great mat!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the mat. It helps me be mindful of where I'm locating my feet for the poses. I like that it's adjustable and I don't have to be ON the spaces indicated because some of them are "taller" than I am. It's very sturdy and I feel grounded, not slipping as I have on other mats. I also like that it doesn't smell funky.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J. DeArmond

customer_reviews.title: It's not a good product. Don't be fooled.
customer_reviews.text: I got the grey sling and the quality is not what I thought given the high rating. I ring to hold my yoga mat is hard to pull and always gets twisted. what a waste of money. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Supragrl

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. It still takes me a few minutes to get it securely on my mat but maybe that’s the operator. Once it tightens faster I’ll really appreciate it. Perfect length - I almost got the longer one just because it had a color I liked with a lower price, but I’m glad I didn’t and just paid the $2 extra. Plus now the Black never looks dirty or used and will match any mat.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy looking cotton strap
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept and design but not so much the material. The cotton works well enough but is harder to handle than a nylon strap due to its inability to slip on/off, and past itself easily due to the cottony texture. Looks like it should be durable though. I am enjoying its lovely lavender color.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Echo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect yoga mat sling
customer_reviews.text: I like that's it's short, there's barely enough room to sling this strap over my shoulder, so it's neat and tidy. The loops are slip loops but remain securely tightened and don't loosen. The fabric is thick, rigid and wide so it feels secure in use. The loops can be adjusted large enough so I can carry my yoga mat and towel in one bundle. I was hesitant to buy this because of so many "unbiased" reviews in exchange for free product but this is a 5 star item for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in AL

customer_reviews.title: No batteries required
customer_reviews.text: The product works perfectly. So easy to use. I use mine to carry a 2 x 4 mat for my greyhound to lay on when eating on restaurant patios. Allows hands free walking the dogs by throwing the mat over my shoulder. I bought two straps and they are very easy to adjust to carry different size items.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Loved it and bought another one in different color
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's skates. I was worried it would be too flimsy for the weight of the skates, but it works perfectly. It's very sturdy and comfortable to carry over the shoulder. It also stays clean, due to the dark blue color. Since I loved it, I got a purple one for my skates!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Fits my pilates mat well
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely sturdy. Which is great for use as a strap. However the stiffness because of the sturdiness makes it a little hard to open and close the loops. I expect with time the material will soften a bit and make that easier. I think this will hold up well for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: jenjan

customer_reviews.title: Great strap! Pretty, thick, and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: This strap is thick and is perfect for my big, thick Aurorae yoga mat! The part that goes around the actual mat to hold it can be stretched a bit if you have a thick mat or tightened if you have a smaller mat. It's also comfortable on the shoulder. I like that it's very simple in design too. Definitely recommend this to any yogis in need of a yoga mat strap/sling.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Does just what I need it to. Holds a yoga mat in place. It's a good length to sling it over your shoulder and carry it around. The loop section that holds the mat has a rounded section (as in not flat strap material) which makes strapping up a mat easy and quick. Does what I need it to, good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have the thick Manduka mat (I have sensitive knees!) and after class getting it to fit in the case again when you’re tired and sweaty is a pain. This is cheap, strong, and fast. The straps are like a slip knot so it’s adjustable even with my super thick mat. Obviously doesn’t offer weather protection.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Strong yoga strap!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my Yoga life. Keeps my Yoga map rolled up tightly and makes it easier to carry around. I'm a newbie so I use the strap to hold my legs up on some balance poses. This strap seems to very strongly constructed, I don't anticipate it streching out like my first one which was made of elastic. This one does not stretch! very well made and comes in such fun colors!
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Escalante

customer_reviews.title: Glad it came free in a promo
customer_reviews.text: I like that it can double as a stretch strap, but I don't like that it doesn't stay tight around rolled mat. Also if not flat around mat, the folded part can leave indentations in mat, but may smooth out eventuay. I believe those parts were intended as handles for stretching but makes mat strap less effective. I might add a velcro strap.
customer_reviews.author: Katgo

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I am using this strap for yoga classes. I did not have one and was constantly struggling with the mat opening up when I was carrying it-very clumsy. I saw some people who had mat bags and some who had mat straps. I was undecided on which to get, but decided to keep it simple and got the strap which I really love. Simple, easy, no fuss, no stuffing a mat in a bag and no washing the bag. Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: bscott

customer_reviews.title: Good strap- not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: This strap is great and does it’s job but it frayed/tore slightly within a week of use- it doesn’t affect the integrity of the strap but still something to note.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: This mat strap is made well, easy to use and carry
customer_reviews.text: Love this strap! It's made well, and easy to put on and take off. The light blue color looks great with my teal blue mat. I like it so much I'm thinking of ordering a regular yoga strap. I had a bag for my mat, and this is just easier and lighter to carry. I totally recommend this mat strap from Clever Yoga!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Strap, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this product. Similar straps were 30$ so I didn't have one for about two years. Easy to use to carry mat; I have not used it in class as a strap. Great color (teal). I paid about 9$. I believe I got the normal size. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Not quite long enough for my mat, but usable
customer_reviews.text: I have a really thick yoga mat, not the thin ones. This strap, while it will fit and I still have a handle to carry my mat, doesn't have enough of a handle for me to be able to wear it on my shoulder like I would prefer. So I have to carry it in hand. I should have gotten a longer length for my thick mat, but this will work.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Korte

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: I am an advanced YOGI been doing yoga for 20 years been always carrying my mat in my gym bag purchased a longer and wider mat that i had to take it out of the gym and carry with me. This size fits perfectly over my shoulder and the right length so that it is just down my back THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Better than a bag - multifunctional
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought a bag for my yoga matt but it was a pain to zip in and out. I bought the strap and it is excellent and reliable -- even if it doesn't protect from dirt the way a bag would. Makes for a quick getaway from class as well. It doubles for stretches as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I got this strap for many reasons. I needed durability & function. This is a twofer in he durability aspect! It but makes transportation easy & it is can be used for stretching assistance. After recently getting the pink mat which is thicker, & adding a thinner mat underneath really made the roll extra bulky. This strap easily adjusts to fit the size of any roll & leaves plenty of strap for over the shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C

customer_reviews.title: Great strap, keeps mat tightly rolled.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great yoga mat strap! The best part (which is a feature that I searched a long time for) is that it stays tightly rolled when you lay the mat down. The strap does not rely on gravity, or holding the mat, for it to stay rolled. Instead it uses the friction against it's own fabric, and the design of the loopholes works well to keep the roll tight.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Kanick

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service 😀
customer_reviews.text: Theses guys are awesome! First off let me say that the product is dope. Very durable, fits well, good colors, very easy to use. Secondly, the customer service is fantastic! I ordered one and they personally emailed me to be sure I was satisfied, and while I told them I liked it very much, I mentioned that it was slightly too small for me. Not a big deal really, it still works great and everything. But they sent me a bigger one for free! Seriously great people, would highly recommend this mat strap for all your yoga carrying needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ian O'Lear

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: The yoga set I bought had a bag to keep the mat and other stuff inside so that's why I decided to purchase the strap. I love the color and material, and also love how much easier it is to carry my mat. My only complaint is that I'm not a tall person so I have to tie a knot on the strap so it doesn't hit me while I walk.
customer_reviews.author: valreads

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and do not purchase this stray - i think a piece of string would work better - not worth the money to send back
customer_reviews.text: Very very cheap and came slightly torn and twisted. Save your money and do not purchase this stray - i think a piece of string would work better - not worth the money to send back but very very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Dance

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Adjustable - Great Strap!
customer_reviews.text: This strap is the best one I have seen for the thicker mat that I use. It's much more durable than the cheap, elastic straps that usually come with yoga mats. I would recommend this for any style mat as it easily adjusts. I am currently using a 1/2" padded mat and this strap handles the size of the roll with no problem. Probably the last strap I will need to buy! I've given several as gifts! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: BeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value, great company
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for two reasons: I walk to yoga and wanted to be able to sling my yoga mat behind my shoulder and because I can then use it as a yoga strap in class. It is perfect for both. But being a bigger guy, I especially appreciate that there is a "long" version available. It's perfect for me. Finally, the company emailed me personally and in a very professional way asked if I was satisfied with their product. That is the hallmark of a great small business, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Fits my yoga mat perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have a fairly thin yoga mat that came with a mesh bag that took forever to get into...with this strap no more fighting. I just roll up my mat and slip the sling on both ends and off I go. It is a very secure fit because the old elastic one that I have for my thicker foam mat fell off and I almost tripped on the mat going down the stairs...thus prompting me to purchase this strap. I am so happy with this product I'm thinking of buying one of their yoga mats. They are latex free which is a necessity for those of us that have a latex allergy.
customer_reviews.author: Nana T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for extra thick mats
customer_reviews.text: I have an extra thick yoga mat (exercise mat) from Spira I purchased on Amazon. Regular size strap would not go around the mat. I bought the larger size strap and it fit perfectly! I'm very happy I found it here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this. You won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this sling/strap. I was using a yoga bag to carry my gear (I’m a yoga teacher) but it was way too heavy. I’m now just using this strap and a much smaller and lighter bag. One of the reasons I bought this strap is because of all the positive ratings it got. Ratings are important.... keep the feedback up, Amazon shoppers!
customer_reviews.author: lizhill

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Well-made and great color. I have a standard mat and the small one is a good length to hang on my shoulder or even over my head. If you've got a thick mat or like to use two, I'd get the longer one to accommodate the extra thickness. I've also used it as a strap, which is great and cuts down on items I need to bring to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Still great after a year!
customer_reviews.text: Shout out to amazon reviews because I found the perfect strap. I've had this for almost a year now and still in great condition. I practice hot yoga about 3 times a week and I thought it would fray/ become less sturdy but it hasn't! Does the job! It is easy to adjust and stays put very well!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many Yoga Mat straps and decided on this Carrier for its simple and practical design, with durable material. There is no extraneous moving part or accessory --i.e. totally fail-safe (the way things should be engineered in life). I am not disappointed; the carrier worked exactly as expected: quick and effortless to slip on, slip off my rolled-up yoga mat.
customer_reviews.author: KT2012

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy! I lost the strap that came with my 1/2” mat sometime ago and was over attempting to “tie” my mat closed. I travel fairly often and it has made it much easier! I can carry my mat and other bags. The cloth material is high quality and stitched very well. I’ve also used it as leverage when stretching during my practice with pretty good results playing around. I purchased the 85” length and I am 5’7”. Fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Pr0n_Queen

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should. Good strap.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good strap. It is pretty stiff so it is easy to maneuver it around your rolled up mat. I made my own strap with a thick ribbon, D rings, and minimal sewing but it is hard to quickly get around the mat as it is so limp. If you want a no nonsense mat strap this is it! Comes free with a Clever Yoga mat too!
customer_reviews.author: Linus's mom

customer_reviews.title: IDEAL YOGA MAT STRAP
customer_reviews.text: I have not carried the strap to yoga class yet, but it seems to be fabulous! I carried a cloth bag before. It is too small now. The previous reviewers convinced me to get this strap.. It is so easy to put on and off, and no metal pieces or velcro to break, etc. An elegant design. And it is a beautiful color. I just bought the biggest, heaviest yoga mat on the market, and I need a strap that can handle it. This one certainly seems to fill the bill. One of the reviewers mentioned having the same big mat, so that inspired confidence. I am very glad I ordered it! :-D
customer_reviews.author: Pat the Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great simple design, I got one for myself and my wife they thinks our mats well at very sturdy and easyier to use then the cheap elastic ones that stretch out that usually come with mats. We also use these to aide in stretches and use them as a yoga strap... it’s just one less thing we have to bring to class when you have something that serves two purposes
customer_reviews.author: oakleytexas

customer_reviews.title: Very well made yoga mat strap
customer_reviews.text: I use both thick and thin yoga mats together to cushion my knees. The original elastic strap broke and I had been carrying the rolled up duo ever since - very cumbersome. I love this strap. It is completely adjustable, is well made and makes carrying my mats effortless. There is plenty of slack to sling it over my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Meow mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Convenient,and Price Point is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool product. I used to carry my yoga mat inside a zip-up bag and it got too annoying sometimes; I had to roll it "just right" or it wouldn't fit. With this mat sling, I roll my mat, widen the outside sling straps, put them on the ends of my mat, and pull the middle right onto my shoulder. Super easy, no Velcro, very basic and that's what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Sheli D.

customer_reviews.title: The extra long is EXTRA long
customer_reviews.text: The strap is good, especially for the price, but the extra long strap is realllllly long. I’m 6’1” and when I put the strap over my shoulder (across my chest, like a messenger bag), my yoga mat hangs down by my butt. It’s not necessarily bad, just longer than I expected. That being said, I should have read more closely, and I like the strap overall, so I’m happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the mat strap that I lost at my yoga class. I love that I can also use it as a strap for my yoga practice. It is available in colors (I bought blue) which is helpful when I take it to yoga classes since it can't get mixed up with the studio straps.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The width of the strap make it comfortable on the shoulder
customer_reviews.text: Simplicity itself. Slip knot style, no hardware to break or get in the way. Made of heavy duty webbing, it's a wee bit stiff and lumpy around the area where the "slip knot" is, but not to the point of causing any functional problems. The width of the strap make it comfortable on the shoulder. I was wondering if it might not also function as an exercise strap, and I see that another reviewer has mentioned doing just that. I ordered my first one a few weeks ago, and decided to order another so that even my old mat has a good strap. Seems like there are probably other things it could be used for, too.
customer_reviews.author: sfdee

customer_reviews.title: Great way to transport my heavy mat
customer_reviews.text: I love this strap! I have a very heavy, dense Manduka Pro mat, and this is the perfect solution for transporting it. I am 5’4” and the regular size strap works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: crazywithkids

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Customer Service and Great Yoga Strap
customer_reviews.text: Awesome customer service and their yoga strap is so well made. I by mistake bought an "extra long" strap and they replaced it without charge -- and without my even asking for it to be replaced. It was my fault for not reading the discription when I first ordered it. They call it their Namaste Warranty.
customer_reviews.author: MEJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Strap!
customer_reviews.text: Great strap. I ordered the longer one. I use it to carry my mat and to stretch. Don't use the one that came with you mat for stretching. Those typically have velcro closures. This one is much, much (mucher) better!
customer_reviews.author: Bassmanmike

customer_reviews.title: It works fine
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it does what I need it to do. Throw my rolled up matt with its yoga strap and go. My older one had Velcro straps. I prefer that,has a wide shoulder strap which is comfortable..
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I was looking for. Super durable and easy on the hands when gripping firmly. I really love the customer service company too; I had questions about the color options and they answered right away.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaila

customer_reviews.title: Wish I  had  ordered this years ago
customer_reviews.text: Originally I ordered the shorter strap but had to send it back because it was to short for my extra thick mat. I ordered the grey 85 length and its perfect. It's easy to use and I love having my own strap to use in class. Very durable and I can put it over my shoulder. Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Yoga mat strap sling
customer_reviews.text: I received the package early but it was opened but I couldn’t find anything wrong with it. The strap Was too short for my mat because I have a thicker Mat than usual so I’m going to give it to my neighbor and order the longer strap. It is well-made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bulky but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I took out a star for the simple fact of the look of it. It’s extremely bulky and not as dainty as I hoped it would be. It is extremely durable and easy to use, I just wish it looked a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Uses ;)
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect! I actually bought it to use primarily for my skates. The color goes great with my bunnies! It's awesome to stretch with after being at the skate park. That's why I wanted the extra length. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: AmyMarie

customer_reviews.title: Wow great strap & customer service
customer_reviews.text: Wow great strap & customer service! After I purchased the address I received an email grin the company and then another one in follow up after I received the item wanting to know about my experience and my thoughts on the strap, how its working out for me, etc. The strap is very well made and fits me perfectly along with carrying a very thick blanket & my yoga mat! I'm 5'2", small body frame and there is plenty of strap left to fit me perfectly along with these 2 items. I Love the product & will be suggesting it to some friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: No Velcro is a big plus.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I hate the velcro straps. The velcro gets dirty, is loud, and annoying to wrap properly. This strap solves those issues and can be attached to my mat much faster. Also it's not too long, which keeps my mat securely snug against my back.
customer_reviews.author: Peter N.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like it. However: 1. the length of the sling is too long. I'm 5'3 and the length of this sling makes carrying my mat on my back impossible 2. the stitching on the sling digs into my yoga mat and made scratches/dents on my yoga mat.
customer_reviews.author: Floofen

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent mat strap for a reasonable price. The strap is very sturdy and the end loops are easy to adjust yet hold the mat firmly. I am tall (6'5") so I got the longer strap and it is the perfect length and is comfortable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Craig K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to carry.
customer_reviews.text: Love the yoga mat strap. I have a mat that’s all rubber so it is very sticky. It was very difficult to get into a bag. The strap is very easy to use, holds tight to the mat, and can easily be hung over my shoulder to carry. I’m going to order another one for my husband! Thank you so much for that easy to use strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect strap
customer_reviews.text: This strap is perfect. I bought one in black for my boyfriend too. The thick material is nice and durable. The strap is easy to use too. I use it just about everyday to transport my mat to and from class.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very well made strap
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It's a yoga strap. It is the perfect length for me, the loops are easy to adjust for a quick slip on or off your mat and as a guy, I like the black color. You can tell it is made of very durable material and I don't foresee it every coming apart. I keep it on my mat and inside my cargo net of my car. Always keeps the mat tight and never slips. So much easier carrying my mat into class now.
customer_reviews.author: 49erinnc

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: This is the best.. Slips on easily, cinches down snugly keeping mat tightly rolled. Distributes the weight evenly over the shoulder when carrying. Perfect for travel and for neatly storing in my closet. Beats the single loop of the yoga strap I had been using. Can also be used to stretch. Foot fits in one end and the other loop acts as a no slip handle. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: Great dual-purpose strap at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a cloth yoga mat bag, which I did like, but it is out on permanent loan. I decided to replace it with this strap because it can be used both to carry my rolled-up mat and as an aid to stretching. It works great for both purposes, and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good, nice and sturdy and the length is perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: Roll up my Yoga mat, wrap this strap sling around it, toss it in my truck and BOOM! Headed to Yoga all organized and ish. My mat doesn't come unraveled now, and I no longer have to wrestle with it before and after class. That's a real problem no one warned me about when I started Yoga about a month ago. You need some very important gear, and this is one of the pieces of the puzzle right here. Get it. The quality is good, nice and sturdy and the length is perfect for slinging it over my shoulder after Hot Flow. Namaste.
customer_reviews.author: smf

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy strap.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong strap. I bought one, liked it so much I bought 2 more - 1 for a friend and the other for a second (thicker) Pilates mat I have. Love that it can be used as yoga strap for class as well as mat carry strap. Also appreciate seller’s follow up to ensure satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to Yoga, love it so it was time to gear up. I bought a Manduka Pro mat and needed a strap. This is easy to use, doesn't slip at all, and thick enough it doubles as a stretching strap. Zero complaints!
customer_reviews.author: PS03

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Finally an easy to use yoga strap! I used to have a yoga bag but hated bringing that into the studio, I was looking for something small that wouldn't take up much space next to my water bottle in class. My favorite thing about this strap is the expandable size to carry your mat - I have a 71 inch 5mm mat that I often roll up with my towel after class. I was worried that the strap wouldn't be able to accommodate this, but the strap is very easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper67

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that it wouldn't stay tight around the mat after it was on. Turned out not to be a problem. Stays tight when not in use. I got the longer strap may have wished that I went with the shorter one, still a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: RLB

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't slip off!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a yoga strap that would not slip off while I was carrying it and that would fit over my shoulder easily. This does both. I got the shorter version and it is plenty long enough for me. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen W.

customer_reviews.title: Great mat sling!
customer_reviews.text: This sling is nice. It is adjustable, although I'm a little inept with it but with some effort, I can readjust as necessary. I like to put my mat along with my strap in the adjustable loop and it all stays in place. The sling is large enough that I can put it over my head on my shoulder and there's plenty of room to do so comfortably. I like it, and the company seems pretty great too. I'd purchase again, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend the larger size
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. I ordered the 66 inch in grey. It's just big enough to fit over the ends of my yoga mat and then sling over one shoulder (I'm 5'6, 130 lbs). If you want it long enough to fit over a backpack or you are very tall or stocky, I'd recommend the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette A. Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy to Use, Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, easy-to-use strap. I had one in the past with velcro stips instead of the loops that you can simply slide open- I originally wanted another velcro-type one, but I'm so glad I got this instead. Super easy to just slip the loop open to fit any size yoga mat- I have two rolled up inside in the pictures and this handles that with ease. My old one would not have been able to hold both together. You just slide it tight after putting your mat in and go. Amazing price for the quality as well- the material is thickly woven and super sturdy. So quick to slip on and off of the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent yoga strap without buckles
customer_reviews.text: I picked this yoga strap because it doesn't have buckles. Strap is sturdy, easy to put onto and take off of my rolled up yoga mat, and looks great. As an aside, I received the first one I ordered quickly. Upon taking it out of the packaging, I noticed the thread bunched up during sewing. It worked fine, but didn't look good. I let the Seller know of the problem, and they immediately sent me another one, and told me to keep the old one. I was very impressed with this excellent costumer service.
customer_reviews.author: Cadeau's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat Strap Sling- Happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: I just switched to a heavier rubber mat. I knew I need a strong sturdy strap. This strap is awesome! Great quality, holds my mat great. I even can use it for stretching although that is not the intent. I would like to see the option to make shorter. I bought the longer strap and realized I didn't need so much slack. But it does not matter. I love the strap. I recommend it to any yogi! Namaste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a winner.
customer_reviews.text: It works tomorrow and I am very happy with it. This is the first time I’ve bought a strap which I need for my rehab of my knee. My therapist has a strap that has two handles on each side so you can get a closer grip if you wish. I think that is also a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Makes carrying the mat so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased the mat as a gift for a friend. She really loves it! It works well and is easy to take on and off the mat. I (and she) would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lillie Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: This sling works great! I see a lot of people questioning which ...
customer_reviews.text: This sling works great! I see a lot of people questioning which size to get. My wife is 5'-10" and I bought the 66" strap sling for her. It's the perfect size for a single mat, keeping it riding right around her rib cage area. Great quality and vibrant color! Definitely a must-have for someone who plans to take their mat out of the house with them. Nothing worse than trying to carry around an unsecured yoga mat.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT straps for the price! I had a lovely silvery strap from a well-known company but it was silky and it fell off the mat as soon as I set the mat down! The cotton woven strap does not fall off and it has a nice wide strap that will not cut into your shoulders like those "rope-like" straps will.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Love the adjustable aspect
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with past yogi mat slings where they were not able to be adjusted to accommodate my mat size. This sling is completely adjustable and easy-peasy. Love!
customer_reviews.author: A-Lo

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! The adjustable loops make it easy to slide over my yoga mat for carrying to/from class, and once I'm there, I have a strap ready to go. This strap is a good length for improving flexibility during poses without having to deal with the D rings or miles of extra strap length. Customer service is also very nice and personal with this company. Very impressed with both product and service.
customer_reviews.author: CAMomof3

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the strap is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I love these straps. I bought two, one for my blankets and one for my mat. I love how well made they are. I got the smaller size and it holds two blankets rolled up. With the covid virus we have to bring our own props to class and the straps have made it so much easier to carry everything. Thank you for making such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: CONNIE E

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly met my needs
customer_reviews.text: This mat strap easily converts from mat carrier to an extension for my arms in different binds/positions. I am 5’5” and the shorter strap length hangs between my waist and hip when I’m carrying the mat. I am very happy with my purchase and have already recommended it to my yoga class!
customer_reviews.author: J. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Now I can Carry My Yoga Mat
customer_reviews.text: The width of the carrying strap is perfect for my shoulder, putting the mat in it is simplicity defined. The standard length puts my 68" 4mm yoga mat at my hip level when carried on my shoulder. I am just under 5'7". Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Romantic in Chicago

product_meta.title: Clever Yoga Yoga Mat Strap Sling – Adjustable Durable Cotton Yoga Mat Carrier – Carrying Strap in Standard (66") or Extra Long (85") for Thick Yoga Mat - Doubles As Yoga Strap for Stretching – from
feature_bullets: 100% all natural cotton Clever Yoga Sling fits almost all yoga and excises mats
It sits comfortably on your shoulder(s) with 1.5 inches width. Best holidays gifts for families and friends in 2015.
Double duty. Some of our customers use it as yoga strap for yoga poses, strectch and physical rehabilitation

Our Clever Yoga sling is more than just another Yoga Sling. In addition to getting the highest quality Yoga Sling available on the market, you also working with a family owned business who are attentive to your needs and here to help answer any questions you have.

When you order your Clever Yoga “Yoga Sling” today you’re protected by our “Namaste” Lifetime guarantee – if you’re not 100% satisfied with your Yoga Strap or if it doesn’t hold up for you forever, we’ll replace it free of charge – no questions asked. So order now!
